cmp: 匕 (an ancient type of spoon, dagger/ladle)
mng: purple, violet, amethyst, Lithospermum erythrorhizon (flowering plant whose root provides red purple dye), Japanese: murasaki

exm.mng: the Forbidden City, the Imperial Palace in Beijing, same as 故宮|故宫[Gu4 gong1]
Ziyang County in Ankang 安康[An1 kang1], Shaanxi
thousands of purples and reds (idiom); a blaze of color, fig. a profusion of flourishing trades
flavored roasted seaweed, generic term for edible seaweed, Japanese: nori
